comments:
Version: 3.2.2
Build id: M20070212-1330

Problem exists for final 3.3 release as well.

Steps To Reproduce:

(1) Create new RCP app using Hello RCP template
(2) Go to plugin.xml source page
(3) Remove all spaces (indent) from end extension element tag and 
    start extension element tag as in pasted plugin.xml below
(4) Switch to Extensions form page
(5) Delete both extensions
(6) Switch to plugin.xml source page
    -> BUG:  MalformedTreeException
    -> When end and start extension element tags are separated only by a 
       line delimiter the problem occurs

==============================================
plugin.xml
==============================================
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?eclipse version="3.2"?>
<plugin>

   <extension
         id="application"
         point="org.eclipse.core.runtime.applications">
      <application>
         <run
               class="org.example.rcp.Application">
         </run>
      </application>
</extension>
<extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.perspectives">
      <perspective
            name="Rcp Perspective"
            class="org.example.rcp.Perspective"
            id="org.example.rcp.perspective">
      </perspective>
   </extension>

</plugin>
==============================================



org.eclipse.text.edits.MalformedTreeException: Overlapping text edits
	at org.eclipse.text.edits.TextEdit$InsertionComparator.compare(TextEdit.java:118)
	at java.util.Collections.indexedBinarySearch(Collections.java:313)
	at java.util.Collections.binarySearch(Collections.java:301)
	at org.eclipse.text.edits.TextEdit.computeInsertionIndex(TextEdit.java:757)
	at org.eclipse.text.edits.TextEdit.internalAdd(TextEdit.java:742)
	at org.eclipse.text.edits.TextEdit.addChild(TextEdit.java:332)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.context.InputContext.insert(InputContext.java:248)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.context.InputContext.flushModel(InputContext.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.context.XMLInputContext.flushModel(XMLInputContext.java:451)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.context.InputContext.setSourceEditingMode(InputContext.java:316)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.PDESourcePage.setActive(PDESourcePage.java:244)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.editor.FormEditor.pageChange(FormEditor.java:477)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.PDEFormEditor.pageChange(PDEFormEditor.java:273)
...
